resources.string: Widget Definition: \nWidget is a generic term for a bit of self-contained code that displays a program, or a piece of a program, that is also a shortcut to a larger application.
Android Manifest Definition: \nThe manifest file provides essential information about your app to the Android system including Java package name, describing components of the app and more.

Resource Definition: \nA resource is an externalized piece of data. This is often used for strings and images so that you are able to call a resource (could be thought of as a variable) instead of hardcoding a path or string.
